stories.headline: Tallying city spending on trinkets
stories.summary: Eugene Mulero explores city spending on promotional items, prompted by observations at a local event in Chandler, Arizona.

stories.headline: Records reveal ties behind charity scam
stories.summary: Ronald Campbell investigates the complex network of relationships behind deceptive charity scams, highlighting fraudulent practices.

stories.headline: Hard lessons in first big data wave
stories.summary: Paul Overberg discusses the challenges facing the American Community Survey as it matures and becomes a critical data source.

stories.headline: These sources speak when subjects won't
stories.summary: Duff Wilson provides insights into accessing records for profiling uncooperative sources, highlighting useful online tools.

stories.headline: Capitol aide's two jobs leave money trail
stories.summary: Thomas Peele investigates Steven J. Ding, detailing his dual roles and the financial trails they left, including potential violations of congressional rules.
